samusZ.name: Power Beam
samusZ.description:
Rapidly fire an energy blast for <y>120% damage</c>. <#fffb33>Range increases with level.</c>
<b>Agile: You can shoot while moving.</c>

samusX.name: Missile Launcher
samusX.description:
Fire a <y>powerful missile</c> that explodes on impact, dealing <y>400% damage</c>.
<b>Agile.</c>

samusC.name: Flash Shift
samusC.description:
Blink <y>forward a short distance.</c>
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while blinking.

samusV.name: Morph Bomb
samusV.description: Curl into a ball and lay a <y>small, timed bomb</c> that explodes for <y>300% damage</c>.

samus.endQuote: ...and so she left, with another metroid to remake.
samus.description: The <y>Hunter</c> has received a distress call from the <y>UES Contact Light</c>!
samus.name: Hunter
samus.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<g>[Unexpected Benefactor]

<ul>Luggage & Equipment: Passenger boarded at the time of invasion, equipped with an advanced exoskeleton modified for human use, which has been enhanced with multiple upgrades. The passenger's right arm possesses an adaptable cannon with an extensive arsenal. Individual was unable to be checked fully due to hostile circumstances.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event OM]</c> Individual intercepted UES Contact Light at the time of invasion. Further records lost.
